website_summaries.verdict: Solid wood hangers that will serve many purposes for keeping your wardrobe organized. However, you may want to buy separate hangers for your pants.
pros: Attractive wooden hangers with swivel hooks and side notches
Made of lotus wood with smooth finishes
Strong enough to hold heavy items like suits and coats
cons: Pants have the tendency to slide off the hanger bar
Although rare, some packs contained at least one damaged hanger

customer_reviews.title: Low quality hangers
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was getting a quality hangers based on all the reviews, but instead I got these hangers that appeared to be haphazardly slapped together. I'll let the pictures explain the rest of the details. Thank god I can just quickly return them to Kohl's and look for something better somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Travis G Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Reached beyond my expectations for this product. Works very well, clothes don’t even fall off of them! Forget about the plastic hangers, get these! Great quality wood, looks great in the closet. Oh and my favorite part, it won’t mold your clothes by giving them bumps or ridges.
customer_reviews.author: Qiao Weng

customer_reviews.title: Solid choice of hanger
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid choice of hanger if you're wanting something a little nicer than plastic. I didn't have any problems with the quality or the finish, and they've held up to use for the past 8 months or so.
customer_reviews.author: Magnus Mercury

customer_reviews.title: Great wooden hangers at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Functional wooden hangers....well made....look good in a closet. I'm using these in my 3 bedrooms at the beach and I'm getting compliments from guests all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Susie Brannon

customer_reviews.title: great hangers
customer_reviews.text: At Christmas when I entertain and everybody is coming in wearing their coats, opening my coat closet to stow them away it was a beautiful sight to see all matching hangers that were study enough for heavy coats. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was impressed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3 boxes of 20. I was impressed with the quality of the wood, consistent finish, and overall construction. The hangers are flat, and have a ribbed plastic cover. The natural color is very light wood with very little woodgrain discernable. I would definitely buy them again if I need more.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy, Poorly Made
customer_reviews.text: This product is cheap. The wood is of poor quality, inconsistent, and not straight for all hangers. Also, the colored coating is stripping away from the wood. This is not a good option.
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: Not for slacks
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy hanger, but material used to keep slacks from sliding off hanger is cheap. Very cheap. Like a plastic straw.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Murphy

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: I finally found a great hanger. After trying the velvet ones, acrylic ones, this wood hanger is definitely the best. I wanted a fancy and functional closet and these hangers are really well made, great quality and beautiful color.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Vieira Pimenta Cesana

customer_reviews.title: Classy
customer_reviews.text: I’m redoing my closet and wanted all wood hangers. These ones were so much cheaper than buying them from Walmart or Target. I would highly recommend these if you are looking for a classic style.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria

customer_reviews.title: Chip marks or dents
customer_reviews.text: At first, I was really excited for these hangers and had a lot of expectations because of the high reviews. I looked thoroughly here on amazon before I ended up with these. The reason I’m giving 4 stars is because of the chip marks or dents in some of the hangers (wish I can share the pics now but I can’t seem to find how). I’m really not sure if they should be there or not but anyway, I’d still keep them. So for the sturdiness and durability, I will have to try it so we’ll see.
customer_reviews.author: Krissy

customer_reviews.title: I love my hangers.
customer_reviews.text: I love my wood hangers. Very good and durable for the price. Will be buying again while my inventory grows :)
customer_reviews.author: Amaber D.

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong w the WHITE hangers!
customer_reviews.text: I was gonna go with cherrywood hangers but I had a good feeling about these white wooden hangers!! I used to have plastic hangers all types of colors and they made my closet feel like something was terribly wrong!! If that’s you with all those plastic hangers invest in these huge difference!! Uploaded Before & after piks!
customer_reviews.author: arely

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These are super sturdy and helped me organize my closet. Great price for a great product
customer_reviews.author: amthyest

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in the closet, these are a big bigger thank the plastic hangers
customer_reviews.author: Vicky S

customer_reviews.title: Quality hangers
customer_reviews.text: A very nice set of hangers for a small machine shop Personnel use.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. B

customer_reviews.title: Strong enough for heavy coats
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Good price. Won’t snap under heavy load as does plastic. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Fire Boy

customer_reviews.title: Study and Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: They feel really well built and hold all my items even my heavy winter wool coat ^_^ Happy with this purchase, will probably buy more in the future as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Great hanger for a steal
customer_reviews.text: So happy with the quality and quantity for the price. Hanger are sturdy and feel like they can withstand the weight of an entire suit over coat and more.
customer_reviews.author: coloradopete42

customer_reviews.title: Great look in my closet
customer_reviews.text: Love the hanger great price .. some were discolored with white film on them . I was able to remove some of the film
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Very great hangers I have one heavy jacket and it holds up, very happy with this purchase I would definitely recommend to anyone and if I need more I will definitely buy these hangers again!
customer_reviews.author: Ramone

customer_reviews.title: Better than Expected
customer_reviews.text: These were even better than expected. For the price, these are a homerun.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Scheiman

customer_reviews.title: Great hangers, worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Really great hangers, noticed an immediate difference and for sure will be buying more of them.
customer_reviews.author: DAlex

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: We used these to make a project of personalized hangers for our team. They were perfect. Very good price for the amount of hangers.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy hangers - great value
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy hangers that work great! Used for heavy jackets and dress pants.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Decent Hanger
customer_reviews.text: Personalizing these and Using them as gifts. Great value for the product.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Hangers
customer_reviews.text: Preform as advertised. Good quality. Pants do not slip off. Purchased over 100, no defects. Looked at a lot of wood hangers, glad a bought these.
customer_reviews.author: kuczmarski

customer_reviews.title: Well built.
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. No cosmetic defects. Sturdy construction and uniform appearance. I bought these twice and the two separate deliveries appeared identical.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Great hangers
customer_reviews.text: Got 40 of these hangers as a gift. Loved them and ordered 80 more.
customer_reviews.author: JoyceBoca

customer_reviews.title: They look EXPENSIVE!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gorgeous and SUPER high quality! I have received multiple compliments on these hangers!
customer_reviews.author: CMC

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Needed for men's clothing especially trousers. Very happy with product.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Lutito

customer_reviews.title: Quite sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The hangars are very sturdy and perfect for hanging my heavier clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Velvet Phogg

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended
customer_reviews.text: Look great and work as intended. No complaints so far
customer_reviews.author: MaineDad

customer_reviews.title: Nice hangers
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift and received as ordered. Looks good.
customer_reviews.author: PClark

customer_reviews.title: great hanger
customer_reviews.text: love the rubber grip for pants, they do not slip off, great hangers....
customer_reviews.author: Elisa E. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Quality is gold
customer_reviews.text: If you want to care for heavy clothing use these.
customer_reviews.author: Tyrone Wyat

customer_reviews.title: Clean, smooth wood hangers and no snags
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about these hanger, perfect size and color. The hook swivels with ease...Packed well and nothing broken! I may have to order a couple more boxes...bought all white for my clothes but I'm ordering the natural color hangers for my husband's side of the closet.
customer_reviews.author: Alba Corona

customer_reviews.title: Factory seconds
customer_reviews.text: For the price I paid we'll keep them because they only hang up clothes out of site. The finish quality is poor. Some have saw kerf scars, finished of course. Five have factory damage that wasn't fixed well and we're daybed with finish. And the finish on all twenty wwas uneven from semigloss to matte. I can't attest to the ruggedness as they only arrived today. But considering the price seconds are okay!
customer_reviews.author: Doug & Jean

customer_reviews.title: Good wooden hangers
customer_reviews.text: Bought two different companies to compare. They are essentially the same, with the exception that these have a plastic protector on the rung to keep from splinters catching. For that distinction alone, this brand wins over the other. Home Wishes had better packaging of the hangers, though. No broken hangers.
customer_reviews.author: Leena

customer_reviews.title: Surface of notches are rough and may snag clothing
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed to find that the there are rough areas on the hangers, even though the description says that a coating covers the wood to give the hangers a smooth surface everywhere. I discovered that the manufacturer must have overlooked the notches because those areas were rough enough to cut my finger. I can imagine that they could easily snag the threads on your clothing.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Great hangers!!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. Great durable hangers. We have purchased over 75 hangers in the last little bit and none have broken. Not one has chipped or bled onto clothing. Not to mention, fast shipping even during these crazy times.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Stubbs

customer_reviews.title: Good quality hangers
customer_reviews.text: These are nice quality wooden hangers but I find them a little expensive. I still think they are a good value compared to others. I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Ana R.

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of those plastic and wire hangers, it just does last. These ones are pretty sturdy and I can see it last for a while... Good buy...
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: The best hangers I’ve owned!
customer_reviews.text: I always wanted to have all wood hangers in my closet... love them! I no longer have hangers bending or breaking... definitely worth your money!
customer_reviews.author: Brinna ann

customer_reviews.title: Great hangers
customer_reviews.text: Great uniform color, durable and really upgraded the look of my closet
customer_reviews.author: moodybubbles

customer_reviews.title: Allows for more room in a closet
customer_reviews.text: I hang suits and sportcoats. Good bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

product_meta.title: StorageWorks 20-Pack Solid Wood Coat Hangers, Wooden Clothes Hangers, Natural Finish
feature_bullets: Clothes hangers made from 100% solid lotus wood, smooth finish protect your clothes well.
The coat hanger features a non-slip rubber tube which prevents jeans or slacks from slipping.
An anti-rust swivel hook designed as a 1.5-inch diameter, suitable for most wardrobe rod, also allows 360° rotation for easy hanging.
Two crafted shoulder notches design for keeping tops, skirts, dresses, and straps in place.
Quality wood hangers perfect for all shapes and styles of dresses, blouses, coats, shirts, pants, and more. Efficiently hang winter coats, suits, and jackets with ease.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars352 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
